publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6592 Tricia Marwick: Congratulations to South Parks Primary School—That the Parliament congratulates South Parks Primary School in Glenrothes on achieving its first Eco-Flag; notes that each class at the school appointed two pupil representatives to promote the green message over the last year; applauds Asda Glenrothes for donating a flagpole to allow the school to proudly fly its Eco-Flag, and praises all the pupils and teachers at South Parks Primary School for their hard work in securing the award.

S3M-6592 Congratulations to South Parks Primary School (lodged on 16 June 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Brian Adam*, Jamie McGrigor*, Alex Johnstone*, Michael Matheson*, Elizabeth Smith*, Claire Baker*, Sandra White*, Bill Kidd*

S3M-6592 Tricia Marwick: Congratulations to South Parks Primary School—That the Parliament congratulates South Parks Primary School in Glenrothes on achieving its first Eco-Flag; notes that each class at the school appointed two pupil representatives to promote the green message over the last year; applauds Asda Glenrothes for donating a flagpole to allow the school to proudly fly its Eco-Flag, and praises all the pupils and teachers at South Parks Primary School for their hard work in securing the award. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Brian Adam, Jamie McGrigor, Alex Johnstone, Michael Matheson, Elizabeth Smith, Claire Baker, Sandra White, Bill Kidd
S3M-6592 Congratulations to South Parks Primary School (lodged on 16 June 2010) Gil Paterson*
S3M-6592 Congratulations to South Parks Primary School (lodged on 16 June 2010) Stuart McMillan*
